FileFormat.FormatName: ArcSoft Album and SlideShow Files for PhotoStudio and PhotoImpression
FileFormat.FormatDescription: Arcsoft PhotoStudio and PhotoImpression use an (.abm) file to store the image list of files included in an album. Albums can also be saved to a SlideShow folder which includes the same Album format but can have an .sld extension.
